description: Manage and Configure Associations for Application Gateway for Containers resource.

commands.name: az network alb association create
commands.summary: Create an Application Gateway for Containers association resource.
commands.syntax:
az network alb association create --alb-name
                                  --association-name
                                  --resource-group
                                  [--association-type {subnets}]
                                  [--location]
                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--subnet]
                                  [--tags]
                                  [--vnet-name]
examples: az network alb association create -g test-rg -n test-association --alb-name test-alb --subnet <subnetId>

commands.name: az network alb association delete
commands.summary: Delete an Application Gateway for Containers association resource.
commands.syntax:
az network alb association delete [--alb-name]
                                  [--association-name]
                                  [--ids]
                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--resource-group]
                                  [--subscription]
                                  [--yes]
examples: az network alb association delete -g test-rg -n test-association --alb-name test-alb

commands.name: az network alb association list
commands.summary: List all associations for an Application Gateway for Containers resource.
examples: az network alb association list -g test-rg --alb-name test-alb

commands.name: az network alb association show
commands.summary: Get an Application Gateway for Containers association resource.
examples: az network alb association show -g test-rg -n test-association --alb-name test-alb

commands.name: az network alb association update
commands.summary: Update an Application Gateway for Containers association resource.
commands.syntax:
az network alb association update [--add]
                                  [--alb-name]
                                  [--association-name]
                                  [--association-type {subnets}]
                                  [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--ids]
                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                  [--remove]
                                  [--resource-group]
                                  [--set]
                                  [--subnet]
                                  [--subscription]
                                  [--tags]

commands.name: az network alb association wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
